Academic.description: Currently, I am studying a degree in Software Engineering in one of the best universities in Mexico
I was selected to participate in this intense program over weeks including courses, live classes and expert coaching, with the support of Ethereum Foundation & Road to Devcon.
24-hour program on Ethereum development with Solidity taught by CINCEL for the Autonomus University of Queretaro
I won a scholarship to participate in this Web Development bootcamp given by BEDU and Santander Universities.

experience.jobDescription: Uni.DAO is a university ecosystem of the Autonomous University of Queretaro for disruptive technologies such as Blockchain, Web 3.0 and the Metaverse.
I was invited to teach about Programming and Blockchain in one of the best online platform to learn about Finance, Trading, Blockchain and Crypto.
I worked on 4 projects related to Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies.
I was selected to work with an Argentine company that is developing its metaverse.

I work with clients in Web Development using HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap 5, JavaScript, JQuery, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB and CMS such as WordPress, focusing on E-Commerce using Woocommerce and Elementor.
As a strategy advisor I have been involved in events and workshops for different clients and partners of Mr.Coin.
